TopicTitle: Solar panels not functioning correctly after mod installation.

Articles.Content:
Can't gain electric charge or open/close solar panels? I just installed a few mods (mainly graphic ones) and when I installed KER and Kerbal alarm clock all the solar panels that can retract or open would always just open when I would spawn them in the VAB or spaceplane hanger. 
Also my already existing crafts' solar panels would not retract and not produce power, anyone know how to fix this? is it the mod or is this like some kind of thing I accidentally toggled? 

Edited January 23, 2023 by 18Watt
Thread title changed for clarity.

@KerbinIsTheBest_20

For starters, I'll point you to the thread that you should read first before asking for help as it gives a lot of information about what you should include in your threads.

Secondly, I'll ask you to please provide a list of ALL mods you have installed, as well as indicating how you installed them (through CKAN, through GitHub, through some other site, manually, etc.).  Then, I'll ask to see a screen shot of the craft, both the in VAB and in flight, along with an explanation of who is flying the craft (is it being flown by a pilot or a drone core; if it's a Kerbal who isn't a pilot or a drone core, do you have antenna on the craft).  Finally, and although it may not help much, a copy of the log file, which might show what is going on when you try to open the solar panels.

One last pointer:  If you can, please alter the thread title so that it gives at least a bit of a description what is happening.  If you can't do that, please ask one of the mods (like @18Watt, @Vanamonde or @Gargamel) to change it for you.

Sorry for late reply, I had school work to do. I figured it out, it was my Kopernicus messing with my solar panels. Thanks for the help anyways!
